title: 2BR 1 Bath Apartment in South Philly
description:
Hi, I have a two bedroom, one bath apartment currently available for $1600/month, not including utilities available June 1st or sooner.
A little bit about the apartment-- it's located in the Lower Moyamensing neighborhood of South Philly near the corner of 13th and Shunk and conveniently placed one block away from the Broad and Oregon stop of the Broad St subway line. If you have a car street parking is free, usually available, and in a safe area. The apartment is right next door to SouthHouse, a bar/restaurant, around the corner from Black Cat Tavern, and one block away from Marconi Plaza. Passyunk Ave is a short walk away, as well as the Stadium Complex. The house is also a short commute to Center City, the Navy Yard, and University City, and has quick access to I-95 and I-76.
The apartment is on the first floor of a 2 unit row home, includes washer/dryer in basement (free), central air conditioning/heating, and wireless/cable already set up. The apartment also includes a half-finished basement as well as a small backyard patio.
Seeking a 12 month lease, from June 1, 2022 to May 31, 2023. Sorry no pets or smoking in the house and absolutely no drugs. If you're interested please feel free to e-mail me or call me at  show contact info

title: ALL utilities included in rent
description:
ALL utilities included in rent, even Comcast and internet! Available Early July. A very rare opportunity to to live in a penthouse studio over looking Rittenhouse Square. Views to the West, North, and East. Walk right into a contemporary and sleek kitchen with Quartz countertops, stainless steal appliances, high gloss soft close cabinets, a large under mount sink, glass subway tile backsplash, garbage disposal, and a generously sized pantry. In the living space you will find built in cabinets for clothes with a quartz countertop, a closet with plenty of room for long coats, shirts, dresses, etc.. The Bathroom is perhaps the highlight of this studio. Enter through a gorgeous barn door and into a bathroom which includes an LG Washer/Dryer, cabinets for storage, a wood countertop for folding, a beautiful vanity, a sizable medicine cabinet and to top it all off an extremely luxurious custom shower with a 10 inch rainfall shower head, glass doors, and pebble floor tile. There is recessed lighting and brand new wood floors throughout the studio plus stylish window treatments. Although this is a studio, unlike many condos, it has it all. The layout is ideal for a studio with room for a bed and a separate sitting area. This is truly a must see studio! Live in this contemporary retreat among the sky scrapers of Philadelphia! Beautifully located at the quiet, south side of Rittenhouse Square, the Rittenhouse Savoy offers glorious park-side living in Philadelphia's most sought-after neighborhood. The handsome 1950s building welcomes visitors with a midcentury modern lobby, and residents enjoy 24-hour desk services, a spectacular brand new sun deck with panoramic views and fitness center. Short walk to UPENN, Drexel University, Chop, Jefferson Hospital, 30th Street Station, central business district, Kimmel Center, Schuylkill River Park, high-end retail and Philadelphia's best bars, cafes, and restaurants. No Dogs. ALL utilities included in rent, even Comcast and internet! Available Early July.
Stainless Steel Appliances Main Floor Laundry Hardwoodfloors

title: ALL utilities included in rent
description:
ALL utilities included in rent, even Comcast and internet! Available Early July. A very rare opportunity to to live in a penthouse studio over looking Rittenhouse Square. Views to the West, North, and East. Walk right into a contemporary and sleek kitchen with Quartz countertops, stainless steal appliances, high gloss soft close cabinets, a large under mount sink, glass subway tile backsplash, garbage disposal, and a generously sized pantry. In the living space you will find built in cabinets for clothes with a quartz countertop, a closet with plenty of room for long coats, shirts, dresses, etc.. The Bathroom is perhaps the highlight of this studio. Enter through a gorgeous barn door and into a bathroom which includes an LG Washer/Dryer, cabinets for storage, a wood countertop for folding, a beautiful vanity, a sizable medicine cabinet and to top it all off an extremely luxurious custom shower with a 10 inch rainfall shower head, glass doors, and pebble floor tile. There is recessed lighting and brand new wood floors throughout the studio plus stylish window treatments. Although this is a studio, unlike many condos, it has it all. The layout is ideal for a studio with room for a bed and a separate sitting area. This is truly a must see studio! Live in this contemporary retreat among the sky scrapers of Philadelphia! Beautifully located at the quiet, south side of Rittenhouse Square, the Rittenhouse Savoy offers glorious park-side living in Philadelphia's most sought-after neighborhood. The handsome 1950s building welcomes visitors with a midcentury modern lobby, and residents enjoy 24-hour desk services, a spectacular brand new sun deck with panoramic views and fitness center. Short walk to UPENN, Drexel University, Chop, Jefferson Hospital, 30th Street Station, central business district, Kimmel Center, Schuylkill River Park, high-end retail and Philadelphia's best bars, cafes, and restaurants. No Dogs. ALL utilities included in rent, even Comcast and internet! Available Early July.

title: Come see this incredibly spacious townhome
description:
Come see this incredibly spacious townhome, nestled in a private courtyard! Located within the Meredith School Catchment in Queen Village, this home truly has everything you need from a private outdoor space, to garage parking to open concept living! Upon entering on the 1st floor landing, you will make your way up the stairs into the main living and dining area. The welcoming living area is open concept style and very spacious. The spacious kitchen is equipped with wood cabinetry, gorgeous countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large breakfast bar area. The living space is filled with natural and recessed lighting and also includes a sliding back door which gives access to the back patio area great for grilling and entertaining! The rest of the space is filled with 3 incredibly spacious bedrooms with great closet space, lots of natural light, and high ceilings! Not to mention, the 3rd bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. There are a total of 2.5 bathrooms in this unit and all have their own special characteristics. The first full bathroom includes a modern vanity and a stall shower/tub combo! The 2nd full bathroom features an extra wide vanity countertop, a stall shower and separate soaking tub! The basement is home to the washer/dryer and this unit also features 1 car garage parking as well as 1 outdoor spot, directly outside the garage! Talk about convenience! Now let's talk location. This townhome is perfectly situated in the charming neighborhood of Queen Village where dining and shopping is all around. Check out local favorites like The Bagel Place, Red Hook Coffee and Tea, Cry Baby Pasta, Neighborhood Ramen and so many more! Take Front Street North to experience local neighborhoods like Society Hill, Head House Square, and Old City. Venture a couple blocks West to indulge in all E Passyunk Ave. has to offer! Easy transportation includes I-95 and local bus stops. Does this sound like your new home? If so, come by and see this amazing townhome for yourself by scheduling a showing today!

Wow! and Wow! Take advantage of the past and the present in this quiet-streeted neighborhood cutie that is mere steps from everything the main drag of Fishtown has to offer! Cuddle up to coziness when you step into this sweet home that dates to 1894 but offers the most gorgeous, brand new kitchen. Imagine this charming home with wood floors throughout, as well as a lovely fireplace and bronze covered, original coal chute smack in the middle of your living room! There, you can relax in the charming room and take your meals on the living room side of the windowed kitchen, so that you can talk to the designated cook who is diligently cooking your meals in the beautifully modern kitchen. In case the weather cooperates, you can also take your meals in your very own enclosed patio, accessible through your kitchen. Upstairs, you have two roomy bedrooms, a hall closet and a good sized bathroom. Relax in the gorgeous claw-foot tun or take that quick shower in the the modern stall shower.
Laundry in Building Parking available  Pets Allowed Hardwoodfloor Stainless Steel Appliances

title: The Custom House in Olde City is a unique condo
description:
The Custom House in Olde City is a unique condo building offering the residents the best the city has to offer... This condo is just steps from shops, restaurants and entertainment and easy access to I95 ... the lobby features a secure camera monitored lobby, elevator and nicely lit hallways... Take the elevator to this top floor unit, quietly located at the end of the hallway... This spacious unit, Two Bedroom /Two Bathroom , is one of the largest in the building, features a great open layout with high vaulted ceilings... Upon entering this unit you will be struck by the beautiful cherry hardwood floors throughout the condo... There is a designer kitchen with 42 custom cabinets, granite counter tops with upgraded granite back splash and stainless steel appliances... You'll enjoy sitting at the island breakfast bar with extra cabinetry and multiple outlets for all your needs... Juliet balcony off the Main bedroom . There is also a utility room with full size washer/dryer…and a storage locker in the basement of the building .

title: Olde Kensington 3 bed 2 bath apt with W/D, patio, C/A & more!
description:
1802 N 5th St #1 – 3 bed 2 bath bi-level apt with patio -AVAILABLE April
Come see why everyone is moving to Old Kensington! This area is gleaming with new restaurants, boutiques, coffee shops and more! With very convenient access to I-95 north & south, getting in and out of town is super easy. With Fishtown only a few blocks away, enjoy becoming a regular face at the International Bar for cocktails, or La Colombe for that morning pick me up. This location has a ton to offer now and will only have more soon!
This 3 bed 2 bath bi-level apartment has everything you need and more to be comfortable. The first bedroom is on the left as you enter with plenty of room and a nice double door closet, catching all that morning sunlight! With a massive 1st floor living and dining space, having friends and family over will be easy and fun! Enjoy dining a la carte with your back patio! With a custom bathroom with shower stall and dual vanity on the first floor, you have the modern chic look.
Head downstairs to find two more bedrooms and a full bathroom with similar finishing touches upstairs. The bedrooms downstairs have plenty of room and closet space for all your belongings. With the bedrooms divided by a second large living area, privacy is no issue.
DON’T FORGET YOU HAVE YOUR OWN WASHER AND DRYER!!
